Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored 58 off 47 balls, including 7 fours and 3 sixes
Dunith Wellalage scored 67 not out off 65 balls, including 7 fours and 2 sixes
Wanindu Hasaranga took 3 wickets for 58 runs
Charith Asalanka took 3 wickets for 30 runs
Shivam Dube hit two sixes off Asalanka in the 48th over
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's resilience after a close win
Sri Lanka's captain did not throw in the towel and managed to save the game with wickets
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match ended in a tie
The pitch offered considerable assistance to spinners
India needed just five runs off the last three overs but could not finish the job
